item.title: 【SD Live Performances】SDTV - Michael Jackson - Live in Bad Tour, Yokohama, Japan, 1987 - caladan
item.description:
This is a processed version of a DVD that was made from a VHS tape. The quality is good enough for a VHS from 1987.

My edits using Avisynth, ffmpeg and MKVToolnix: deinterlaced with QTGMC for a smooth 59.94fps, deblocked, resized to 4:3 using Spline36Resize, cropped the edges with ugly video artifacts, saved to MP4 AVC (CRF 18), added song titles to existing chapters, added text info file. The audio is identical with that DVD release.



Track listing:
01. Intro
02. Wanna Be Startin' Somethin'
03. Things I Do for You
04. Off the Wall
05. Human Nature
06. Heartbreak Hotel
07. She's Out of My Life
08. I Want You Back
09. The Love You Save
10. I'll Be There
11. Rock With You
12. Lovely One
13. Workin' Day and Night
14. Beat It
15. Billie Jean
16. Shake Your Body
17. Thriller
18. I Just Can't Stop Loving You
19. Bad
